unnormalised: Doc-an mhaka viral infection asa mhunn sanglam. Gambhirponnan? Mumbai local-an mhaji sadanchi yet-voch itaunchi itli infectious nasli mhunn? Maka he antibiotics disak tin pavtti 7 disam khatir gheunche poddttele, nam tor Dr. Sharma mhaka lecture divpacho!
normalised: Daktoran sanglay mhaka viral infection zala mhunn. Khorench? Mumbai local-antlean mhoji rojachi yet-voch itli infectious nasli mhunntoch? He antibiotics disak tin pavttim saat disam khatir ghevpak zai, nam tor Doctor Sharma mhaka lecture ditole!
